SELECT t.id, t.CODE, t.NAME, t.type, d.dict_value typeName, t.cert_type, d1.dict_value certTypeName, t.cert_no, t.link_user, t.link_phone_no, t.address, t.LEVEL, d2.dict_value levelName, t.email, t.wechat_no, t.fax_no, t.saler , t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM customer_supply t LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d ON d.dict_code = t.type AND d.dict_type = 'customer_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d1 ON d1.dict_code = t.cert_type AND d1.dict_type = 'cert_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON d2.dict_code = t.LEVEL AND d2.dict_type = 'customer_level' LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by where 1=1
and t.code like concat('%', #{customer.code}, '%')
and t.name like concat('%', #{customer.name}, '%')
and t.link_user like concat('%', #{customer.linkUser}, '%')
order by t.id desc limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM customer_supply t where 1=1
and t.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%')
and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.link_user like concat('%', #{linkUser}, '%')
